name: Air Fryer Sausage & Pepper Pita Pockets
description: Crispy chicken sausages and sweet peppers cook fast in the air fryer, then get stuffed into warm pitas with mild salsa and sour cream. Kid-friendly, handheld, and ready in under 15 minutes.
prep_steps: Slice bell peppers into thin strips.
Slice red onion into thin wedges.
Split pita bread to make pockets.
Set out salsa, sour cream, shredded lettuce, and grated cheddar cheese.
cook_steps: Toss bell peppers and red onion with 1 tablespoon olive oil.
Place chicken sausages in the air fryer basket; scatter peppers and onions around them in a single layer.
Air fry for 8–10 minutes, shaking halfway, until sausages are cooked through and veggies are tender.
Microwave pita bread for 20–30 seconds to warm and soften.
Slice chicken sausages into bite-size pieces.
Fill each pita with lettuce, peppers and onions, sausage slices, a spoon of salsa, and a dollop of sour cream.
Top with cheddar cheese if desired and serve.

ingredients.preparation: left whole for air frying, then sliced
